alert.note: Alert for Campbell; Corson (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 26 at 9:34AM MST until December 27 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM CST /2 PM MST/ THIS AFTERNOON TO 9 AM CST /8 AM MST/ MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. Wind chill values will drop to 25 below to 34 below zero by early Monday morning. * WHERE...Corson and Campbell Counties. * WHEN...From 3 PM CST /2 PM MST/ this afternoon to 9 AM CST /8 AM MST/ Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 30 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
